thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Diane Pokulok
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Diane Pokulok

author: Diane Pokulok
title: Diane Pokulok
text:
Fortunately, after an extensive Global search, McElhinneys had my dream coat, Their website facilitated the purchase, and made sure I felt secure, as it was an online transaction, in a currency foreign to me. I received two emails from Roisin insuring me that my item was on the way, with tracking information The coat arrived the next day!. What a Great Representative for McElhinneys! It was an honor and a privilege, to deal with Mcelhinneys and their Staff! Thank You, Sincerely.
Diane Pokulok
